argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mattposcl.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | mattposcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 | 1, 3, 2 | #P_matbas2i | |- ( M e. B -> M e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_elmapi | |- ( M e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) -> M : ( N X. N ) --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( M e. B -> M : ( N X. N ) --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_frel | |- ( M : ( N X. N ) --> ( Base ` R ) -> Rel M ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( M e. B -> Rel M ) |
| 9 |  | #P_relxp | |- Rel ( N X. N ) |
| 10 |  | #P_fdm | |- ( M : ( N X. N ) --> ( Base ` R ) -> dom M = ( N X. N ) ) |
| 11 | 6, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( M e. B -> dom M = ( N X. N ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_releqd | |- ( M e. B -> ( Rel dom M <-> Rel ( N X. N ) ) ) |
| 13 | 9, 12 | #P_mpbiri | |- ( M e. B -> Rel dom M ) |
| 14 |  | #P_tpostpos2 | |- ( ( Rel M /\ Rel dom M ) -> tpos tpos M = M ) |
| 15 | 8, 13, 14 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( M e. B -> tpos tpos M = M ) |
